python.title: Setup
python.content: To begin the setup process, please download Python by following the instructions here: https://www.python.org/downloads/. Make sure you add Python to PATH (this should appear as a checkbox during installation).

python.title: Testing
python.description: Making sure the Python installation worked
python.content:
Type this into command prompt (or Terminal): 
python --version
If the command is not found, then the installation failed (or you didn't setup the path).

python.title: Writing a Class
python.content:
<pre class='language-python'><code class='language-python'>class HelloWorld:
	def __init():
		print("Hello World")
